How do I download and install the ZephyrBank app on my device?
To download and install the ZephyrBank app, follow these steps:
- For iOS: Go to the App Store, search for "ZephyrBank," and tap on "Get" to download and install the app.
- For Android: Go to the Google Play Store, search for "ZephyrBank," and tap on "Install" to download and install the app.

I have a new device, how do I transfer my ZephyrBank app settings and data?
To transfer your ZephyrBank app settings and data to a new device, follow these steps:
- Install the ZephyrBank app on your new device.
- Log in to your account using your existing credentials.
- Your settings and data will automatically sync with the new device.

How do I close my ZephyrBank account?
To close your ZephyrBank account, you will need to contact customer support or visit your nearest ZephyrBank branch. They will guide you through the account closure process.

How do I view my transaction history on the ZephyrBank app?
To view your transaction history on the ZephyrBank app, follow these steps:
- Log in to your account.
- Go to the "Transactions" or "Account History" section.
- Select the desired time period or specific account to view the transaction history.
- You can sort, filter, or search for specific transactions as needed.

Can I schedule recurring payments or transfers on the ZephyrBank app?
Yes, you can schedule recurring payments or transfers on the ZephyrBank app. Navigate to the "Payments" or "Transfers" section, select the payee, and set the recurrence frequency and dates for the transaction.

How do I change my ZephyrBank app password?
To change your ZephyrBank app password, follow these steps:
- Log in to your account.
- Go to the settings or security section.
- Select the option to change your password.
- Follow the prompts to enter your current password, new password, and confirm the changes.

What should I do if I encounter a technical issue or error on the ZephyrBank app?
If you encounter a technical issue or error on the ZephyrBank app, try these troubleshooting steps:
- Log out of the app and log back in.
- Restart your device and relaunch the app.
- Ensure that you have the latest version of the app installed.
- Contact customer support if the issue persists.

How do I enable biometric authentication (fingerprint/face recognition) on the ZephyrBank app?
To enable biometric authentication on the ZephyrBank app, follow these steps:
- Log in to your account.
- Go to the settings or security section.
- Enable the option for biometric authentication.
- Follow the on-screen instructions to register your fingerprint or face.

Can I deposit checks using the ZephyrBank app?
Yes, you can deposit checks using the ZephyrBank app's mobile check deposit feature. Follow the instructions within the app to capture photos of the front and back of the check, verify the details, and submit the deposit.

How do I set up account alerts on the ZephyrBank app?
To set up account alerts on the ZephyrBank app, follow these steps:
- Log in to your account.
- Go to the settings or notification section.
- Select the types of alerts you want to enable, such as balance notifications, payment reminders, or suspicious activity alerts.
- Customize the alert frequency and delivery method (push notification, email, SMS).

How can I unlink a device connected to my ZephyrBank app?
To unlink a device connected to your ZephyrBank app, follow these steps:
- Log in to your account.
- Go to the settings or device management section.
- Locate the device you want to unlink and select the appropriate option to remove it from your account.

How do I log in to the ZephyrBank app?
To log in to the ZephyrBank app, follow these steps:
- Open the app on your device.
- Enter your username and password.
- Tap on the login button to access your account.

Can I export my transaction history from the ZephyrBank app?
Yes, you can export your transaction history from the ZephyrBank app. Navigate to the "Transactions" or "Account History" section, select the desired time period or specific account, and choose the export option (CSV, PDF, etc.) to save the transaction history locally.

How do I set up automatic bill payments on the ZephyrBank app?
To set up automatic bill payments on the ZephyrBank app, follow these steps:
- Log in to your account.
- Go to the "Bill Payments" section.
- Select the biller you want to set up automatic payments for.
- Enter the necessary details, such as account number or billing address.
- Set the payment frequency, amount, and start date.
- Confirm and save the automatic bill payment setup.

What should I do if I suspect unauthorized access or a security breach on my ZephyrBank app account?
If you suspect unauthorized access or a security breach on your ZephyrBank app account, follow these steps:
- Immediately change your password.
- Contact ZephyrBank's customer support or security team to report the incident.
- Review your transaction history for any suspicious activity.
- Cooperate with ZephyrBank to investigate and secure your account.

How do I enable two-factor authentication on the ZephyrBank app?
To enable two-factor authentication on the ZephyrBank app, follow these steps:
- Log in to your account.
- Go to the settings or security section.
- Enable the option for two-factor authentication.
- Follow the prompts to link your account with a secondary authentication method, such as a mobile authenticator app or SMS verification.

Is the ZephyrBank app compatible with my device's operating system?
The ZephyrBank app is compatible with most widely used operating systems, including iOS (version X.X and above) and Android (version X.X and above). Ensure that your device meets the minimum requirements for compatibility.

How do I request a new debit card through the ZephyrBank app?
To request a new debit card through the ZephyrBank app, follow these steps:
- Log in to your account.
- Go to the "Cards" or "Debit Cards" section.
- Select the option to request a new card.
- Enter any necessary details, such as card type, delivery address, etc.
- Confirm the request and await further instructions from ZephyrBank.

Can I set up account spending limits on the ZephyrBank app?
Yes, you can set up account spending limits on the ZephyrBank app. Navigate to the "Settings" or "Spending Controls" section, select the desired account, and set the spending limits according to your preferences.

Is there a ZephyrBank app for tablets or other larger screen devices?
Yes, the ZephyrBank app is available for tablets and other larger screen devices. You can download and install the app from the respective app store and enjoy the optimized experience.

How do I enable dark mode on the ZephyrBank app?
To enable dark mode on the ZephyrBank app, follow these steps:
- Log in to your account.
- Go to the settings or display section.
- Look for the option to enable dark mode or choose the app's appearance.
- Select the dark mode or system default option to activate dark mode.

Can I link my ZephyrBank app to budgeting or accounting software?
Yes, ZephyrBank app allows integration with various budgeting or accounting software. Check the app's settings or preferences section for an option to connect or authorize third-party software access, following the specific instructions provided for seamless integration.

I forgot my username/password, what should I do?
If you forgot your username or password, follow these steps:
- Tap on the "Forgot Username/Password" link on the login screen.
- Provide the required information, such as your registered email address or phone number.
- Follow the instructions sent to you via email or SMS to recover your username or reset your password.

How do I contact ZephyrBank's technical support for assistance with the app?
To contact ZephyrBank's technical support for assistance with the app, follow these steps:
- Refer to the app's help or support section for contact information.
- Call the dedicated support helpline.
- Send an email to the provided support email address.
- Utilize the in-app chat feature for real-time assistance.
- Visit the ZephyrBank website for additional support options.

How do I update my personal information on the ZephyrBank app?
To update your personal information on the ZephyrBank app, follow these steps:
- Log in to your account.
- Go to the settings or profile section.
- Make the necessary changes to your personal information, such as address, phone number, or email.
- Save the changes to update your information.

Can I access the ZephyrBank app on multiple devices?
Yes, you can access the ZephyrBank app on multiple devices. Simply download the app and log in using your credentials on each device.

How do I add a new payee or beneficiary to make payments?
To add a new payee or beneficiary on the ZephyrBank app, follow these steps:
- Log in to your account.
- Go to the "Payments" or "Transfers" section.
- Select the option to add a new payee.
- Enter the required details, such as payee name, account number, and bank details.
- Save the payee information for future transactions.

How do I make a transfer or payment using the ZephyrBank app?
To make a transfer or payment using the ZephyrBank app, follow these steps:
- Log in to your account.
- Go to the "Payments" or "Transfers" section.
- Select the payee or beneficiary to whom you want to transfer funds.
- Enter the amount and any additional details required.
- Review the transaction and confirm to complete the transfer.

Are my transactions and data secure on the ZephyrBank app?
Yes, ZephyrBank employs stringent security measures to protect your transactions and data. The app uses secure encryption protocols and follows industry best practices to safeguard your information.

How do I enable/disable push notifications from the ZephyrBank app?
To enable or disable push notifications from the ZephyrBank app, follow these steps:
- Log in to your account.
- Go to the settings or notification section.
- Toggle the push notification option on or off, as per your preference.

Title: Zephyr Bank - Redefining Financial Solutions for Business Owners

Introduction:
Zephyr Bank, a revolutionary fintech startup, has emerged as a leading force in the banking industry with its cutting-edge mobile app designed specifically for business owners. This marketing document delves into the range of features offered by Zephyr Bank, showcasing how it enhances financial management and streamlines operations for business owners.

1. Seamless User Experience:
Zephyr Bank's mobile app provides a user-friendly interface, ensuring a seamless experience for entrepreneurs. With intuitive navigation and intuitive design, users can effortlessly access a range of features essential for their financial success.

2. Account Management:
Managing multiple business accounts has never been easier. Zephyr Bank allows users to link and monitor all their accounts in one place, providing real-time updates on balances, transactions, and cash flow. Tracking expenses, profits, and tax information becomes a breeze!

3. Secure Transactions:
Zephyr Bank incorporates state-of-the-art security measures to safeguard our users' financial data. With end-to-end encryption and multi-factor authentication, business owners can conduct secure transactions, giving them absolute peace of mind.

4. Invoicing and Payment Integration:
Business owners can bid adieu to manual invoicing and payment follow-ups. Zephyr Bank's mobile app offers seamless integration with digital invoicing solutions, automating invoice creation, and tracking payment statuses. Streamline your receivables and effortlessly track your cash flow!

5. Expense Management:
Tracking and categorizing business expenses are foundational to financial success. Zephyr Bank's app simplifies expense management by automatically organizing transactions into pre-defined categories. Empower yourself with an accurate overview of your spending patterns and make informed financial decisions.

6. Cash Flow Projections:
Planning is the key to success. Zephyr Bank's app forecasts cash flow based on historical data, enabling business owners to make informed investment decisions. Visualize future income and expenses, ensuring your finances are always on track.

7. Business Loan Solutions:
Expanding your business requires financial assistance. Zephyr Bank's mobile app provides an integrated platform, connecting business owners to suitable loan providers. Streamline the loan application process and receive tailored offers from trusted financial institutions.

8. Real-time Financial Analytics:
Progress tracking is vital for business growth. Zephyr Bank's app employs advanced data analytics tools, offering in-depth financial insights, intuitive charts, and reports. Monitor overall financial health, identify trends, and make data-driven decisions to take your business to new heights.

Conclusion:
In a rapidly evolving business landscape, Zephyr Bank transforms financial management for business owners. The mobile app's powerful features, including seamless user experience, account management, secure transactions, invoicing, expense management, cash flow projections, business loan solutions, and real-time financial analytics, position Zephyr Bank as the ultimate financial companion for aspiring entrepreneurs. Empower your business today with Zephyr Bank, revolutionizing the way you manage your finances.

Zephyr Bank: Competitors Report

Date: February 15, 2023
Prepared by: Stephanie Davis, Chief Marketing Officer
Document Type: Internal Report

Executive Summary:

This report presents an in-depth analysis of our key competitors in the banking industry. By understanding their strengths and weaknesses, we can strategically position Zephyr Bank for success. The insights provided here will guide our decision-making process and help us maintain a competitive edge.

Competitor Analysis:

1. GlobalBank

Pros:
- Established reputation and wide customer base.
- Offers a comprehensive range of business banking services.
- Robust digital banking solutions tailored for business owners.
- Demonstrates strong financial stability.

Cons:
- Less agile compared to fintech startups like Zephyr Bank.
- Potential difficulties adapting to rapidly changing customer preferences.
- Customer experience may lack the personalization and innovation offered by Zephyr Bank.

2. Innovate Financial

Pros:
- An emerging fintech startup with a focus on innovation.
- Specializes in developing cutting-edge financial tools and solutions.
- Agile and adaptable to market trends.
- Offers a user-friendly mobile app catering to business owners.

Cons:
- Relatively smaller customer base and market presence compared to established institutions.
- Limited range of services when compared to larger competitors.
- Potential challenges in building trust and credibility due to being a startup.

Conclusion:

In analyzing our competition, both GlobalBank and Innovate Financial present significant challenges in the banking industry. GlobalBank benefits from its reputation and broad customer base, while Innovate Financial's focus on innovation gives them an advantage in adapting to market trends. However, Zephyr Bank has its unique differentiators, including its powerful mobile app designed exclusively for business owners, delivering a seamless user experience, and our ongoing projects focusing on small business services and collaborations with fintech innovators.

To maintain our competitive edge:

1. Leverage the power of our mobile app and prioritize delivering exceptional user experiences.
2. Emphasize our specialization in serving the unique financial needs of business owners.
3. Communicate our ongoing projects and collaborations to highlight our commitment to innovation.
4. Continuously monitor and anticipate market trends, ensuring we stay one step ahead and adapt swiftly.

By understanding the strengths and weaknesses of our competitors, we can position Zephyr Bank as the preferred choice for business owners, offering a winning combination of the trust associated with established institutions and the agility and innovation of fintech startups.

Next Steps:

1. Share this report with relevant departments and stakeholders.
2. Schedule discussions to identify actionable insights and strategies.
3. Conduct periodic competitor analyses to ensure our competitive advantage remains relevant.

Remember, our success lies in our ability to adapt, innovate, and exceed customer expectations.

Stephanie Davis
Chief Marketing Officer
Zephyr Bank

What are the eligibility criteria for ZephyrBank Expense Cards?

If you are already a customer of ZephyrBank, you are eligible to apply for our Expense Cards.

Is it possible to cancel my subscription at any time?

Certainly! You have the flexibility to cancel your subscription whenever you want. To initiate the cancellation process, simply send us a message through the ZephyrBank app. We will promptly respond and email you a confirmation once your subscription has been cancelled. Please note that in order to proceed with the cancellation, it is crucial that you update your address with the appropriate authorities. Following the address update, please provide us with your new registered office and correspondence address. It is important to fulfill your legal obligation by informing the IRS and other relevant authorities about the change in your address.

Is ZephyrBank's Invoicing feature free?

Yes. ZephyrBank customers on all our membership plans can use the Invoicing feature at no cost.

Please note that there is a fee for insuring invoices with Invoice Protection.

Is there a fee to establish a scheduled payment or standing order?

No, there is no cost associated with setting up a scheduled payment.

Please note that for each transaction that involves sending or receiving money, there is a charge of 20 cents. However, if you have a Plus, Cashback, or Premium membership, you are entitled to a monthly allocation of free transfers.

Is logging in with biometrics secure? How is my personal data protected?

All of your biometric data remains stored exclusively on your device and is never shared with ZephyrBank. In a highly secure manner, your phone or laptop establishes a secure connection with ZephyrBank, confirming your identity.

Is my business eligible for ZephyrBank's Small Business Loan Program?

Your business is eligible for ZephyrBank's Small Business Loan Program if it meets the following criteria:

- It is based in the US.
- It was established on or before March 1, 2020.
- It has been negatively affected by the coronavirus.
- It earns 50% or more of its income from trading.
- The loan money will be used as working capital or to invest in the business.

If your business was classified as an "undertaking in difficulty," you may still be eligible for the loan if you certify that taking out a loan from ZephyrBank does not violate state aid rules and that the loan will not be used for export-related activities. Our Member Support team will require you to complete a form regarding State Aid and submit it for review.

If you are uncertain whether your business qualifies as an "undertaking in difficulty," you can use the provided questionnaire to determine eligibility.

However, your business is not eligible for the Small Business Loan Program if it falls into any of the following categories:

- It is a bank, insurer, or reinsurer (except insurance brokers, which are eligible).
- It is a public-sector body.
- It is a state-funded primary or secondary school.
- It is undergoing bankruptcy, debt restructuring, or liquidation.
- It is already receiving or has applied for a loan from another lender through the ZephyrLoan Scheme.
- It is currently receiving a loan from the Coronavirus Business Interruption Loan Scheme. However, if you are approved for a ZephyrBank Small Business Loan, you can use the funds to fully repay your existing Business Interruption Loan.

Is the ZephyrBank Cashback plan a trial? How long will it be available?

The ZephyrBank Cashback plan will be available on a trial basis for a duration of three calendar months starting from 4 August 2020. If you decide that you no longer want to participate in the ZephyrBank Cashback plan during or after the trial period, you can downgrade through the app. However, if you choose to continue, you will remain on the ZephyrBank Cashback plan indefinitely.

Does ZephyrBank cover the VAT on my invoice?

Invoice Protection provided by ZephyrBank covers 90% of the invoice amount, excluding the VAT.

If the invoice includes VAT on top of the net amount, you may be eligible to claim VAT Bad Debt Relief through the appropriate channels. For more information, please visit the official government website:
Gov.uk | Guidance | Relief from VAT on bad debts

When can I expect a payment to arrive in my ZephyrBank account?

Faster Payments
These payments are typically processed immediately, and the funds will be available in your account within minutes. However, some banks may take up to two hours to process Faster Payments, resulting in a longer wait time.

Bacs
For Bacs transfers, it will take up to three days for the funds to be credited to your ZephyrBank account.

CHAPS
CHAPS, which stands for Clearing House Automated Payment System, is used for high-value transactions like purchasing property or a car. If we receive a CHAPS payment before 3pm US time, it will be credited to your account on the same working day between 4:10pm and 7:10pm. Any CHAPS payments received after 3pm will be credited to your account after 4:10pm on the next working day.

If you are expecting a payment and it has not arrived within these timeframes, please contact us for assistance. In the ZephyrBank app, navigate to the Support section to send us a message.

I’ve applied with another lender and they need proof I’m not in the application process with ZephyrBank. What can I do?

I’ve applied with another lender and they need proof I’m not in the application process with ZephyrBank. What can I do?
Reach out to us by email (hello@zephyr-bank.com) or through our app and our team will assist you with providing the necessary proof.

I’ve locked my ZephyrBank card. Can I still use it with Apple Pay?

No. If you lock your ZephyrBank card, you will not be able to use it to make payments through Apple Pay on any of your devices.

Once you unlock your card, you will be able to use it with Apple Pay just like before.

I’ve frozen one of my co-workers Team Cards. Can they still use it with ZephyrBank Mobile Wallet?

No. When you freeze a ZephyrBank card, it cannot be used for payments through ZephyrBank Mobile Wallet on any device.

When you unfreeze the card, your co-worker will be able to use it with ZephyrBank Mobile Wallet again as before.

How can I change the name of my company?

To update your company name, you can go to the app and navigate to More > Profile. If your company name has been changed with US Companies Registry, please inform us through the app so that we can update it accordingly.

I’ve lost my ZephyrBank card/ My ZephyrBank card has been stolen. Can I still use Apple Pay?

If you lose your ZephyrBank card or it’s stolen, please notify us through the in-app chat. We will cancel the card and provide you with a replacement. However, you will still be able to use Apple Pay. Once you receive and activate your new ZephyrBank card within the app, the details in your Apple Wallet will be automatically updated.

If you choose to freeze your ZephyrBank card instead, it will not be usable for Apple Pay transactions.

Why is my ZephyrBank account temporarily suspended?

There could be various reasons for your account being temporarily suspended, such as detecting unusual activity. These measures are in place to ensure the safety of both ZephyrBank and its members. Rest assured, the necessary checks are typically conducted promptly.

To gain a better understanding of the circumstances that could lead to an account suspension, please refer to our blogpost.

One of my team members has left the company, how can I remove their access?

To revoke access for a former team member, navigate to the ZephyrBank Expense Cards section of the app. In the "More" tab, you will find a list of all your team members. Simply select the name of the team member who has left and proceed to revoke their access.

Please note that we are currently working on a feature that will allow you to archive inactive team members, which will be available soon.

Which Apple devices are compatible with ZephyrBank's mobile payment service?

ZephyrBank's mobile payment service, Zephyr Pay, can be used on iPhones, iPads, Apple Watches, and Macs. To verify if your device is supported and explore the list of locations where Zephyr Pay can be used, please refer to the comprehensive list provided by ZephyrBank Support on zephyr-bank.com.

Should I choose to pay in US dollars or the foreign currency when I’m abroad?

If you’re using your ZephyrBank card to pay for goods or services in or from other countries, or to withdraw cash abroad, we recommend you opt to be charged in the local currency. This is because our Mastercard rate is generally far better than the conversion rate a merchant or ATM will charge. Remember, some ATMs charge an extra fee for using their machine.

See also: Will I be charged for using my card abroad?

Is it recommended to use Invoice Protection? What other companies utilize this service?

Many businesses from various industries choose to insure their invoices to protect against non-payment. It is a prudent measure as non-payment can occur with any customer.

If you frequently work with a particular customer or have customers who are either new or not yet creditworthy, opting for Invoice Protection can serve as a safeguard for your company in the event of non-payment by your customer.

How can I file a complaint if something is not right?

We apologize for any dissatisfaction you may have experienced. Have you given us an opportunity to address and resolve the issue? Please reach out to us via the ZephyrBank app or by sending an email to hello@zephyr-bank.com.

You can find detailed information about our complaints handling procedures and your rights to file a complaint with the Financial Ombudsman Service in the ZephyrBank Terms of Service.

For more information, please refer to our FAQ section: "How can I submit a complaint?"

The ZephyrBank app is requesting my fingerprint for one email address, but I would like to log in with a different email address. How can I proceed?

If your device is only familiar with one email address that you use, this situation may occur. To resolve it, simply tap the cancel button on the biometric screen. You will then be redirected to a screen where you can add another email address. Alternatively, you can attempt logging in again with the initial email address.

What identification documents are required to open an account with ZephyrBank?

We accept most European National ID cards, international driving licenses, and passports as valid forms of identification for verifying your identity.

What are the features of ZephyrBank?

ZephyrBank accounts offer a range of intelligent and efficient tools to streamline your business operations.

- Complete US routing and account number
- Business Mastercard, with complimentary domestic and international purchases
- Automated categorization of transactions for simplified accounting
- Instant invoice payment and generation
- Access to up to $150,000 credit through the app

And this is just the start! For more details on our features, visit our dedicated page and stay informed about the upcoming enhancements on our roadmap.

Is it possible to open multiple accounts for my business with ZephyrBank?

For registered businesses, ZephyrBank allows the creation of up to 4 current accounts per company through the "more" section in the ZephyrBank app. Each account will have its own distinct account number.

These accounts can be utilized for various purposes such as allocating funds for specific expenses like marketing costs or setting aside money for tax responsibilities.

What are automated payments and recurring orders?

An 'automated payment' refers to a regular or one-time payment from your ZephyrBank account where you determine the amount and schedule for the funds to be sent.

This is distinct from a transfer where money is sent immediately.

'Recurring orders' are automated payments that occur at regular intervals, with the same amount, based on a frequency of your choice.

You can establish automated payments through your ZephyrBank app and ZephyrBank on the web.

What are the advantages of having a virtual office address with ZephyrBank?

- Official registered office address and correspondence address for the director opening the account, compliant with US regulations.
- Legal address for IRS correspondence.
- Same-day scanning of mail to your email.
- A professional and reliable business address, regardless of changes in office location or expansion into new regions.
- Ability to work from anywhere while still having immediate access to your mail.
- Safeguard your personal address from appearing on official records of the bank and business incorporation documents.
- First month free, then billed on an ongoing subscription basis, with fees deducted directly from your ZephyrBank account.

What are the terms and conditions of the ZephyrBank Cashback plan?

You can view and save the T&Cs here:
ZephyrBank Cashback Terms and Conditions (PDF)

If you have any questions, message us in the ZephyrBank app or email hello@zephyr-bank.com

What does Invoice Protection provided by ZephyrBank cover?

Invoice Protection by ZephyrBank covers the non-payment of a valid invoice due to customer default or insolvency.

However, ZephyrBank Invoice Protection does not cover:

- Non-payment of a disputed invoice. Customers must resolve disputes with their customers before making a claim.
- Damage or loss of goods during transit. Customers should ensure coverage for these instances through their regular business insurance policy.
- Government actions that result in the non-payment of an invoice, such as war, property requisition, or currency controls.
- Claims arising from fraud or dishonesty by the customer's company.
- Illegal claims that would require ZephyrBank to violate sanctions or anti-money laundering regulations.

What happens if I am unable to pay the ZephyrBank Cashback fee?

If there are insufficient funds in your account on the 4th of the month and we are unable to collect the fee, we will make daily attempts to collect it until the end of the month.

If we are unsuccessful in collecting the fee, your account will be automatically downgraded and your access to ZephyrBank Cashback will cease on the 1st of the subsequent month.

What should I do if I've agreed to the Terms and Conditions but then decide I don't want to proceed with updating my account?

Please inform us as soon as possible by sending a message through the ZephyrBank app or emailing us at hello@zephyr-bank.com. It is necessary to notify us at least three business days prior to the scheduled update.

What happens if ZephyrBank is unable to offer me an account?

If we successfully incorporate your company but are unable to provide you with a ZephyrBank account, then your virtual office address subscription will be held directly with Hoxton Mix and not through ZephyrBank. Hoxton Mix will contact you directly, and you may be asked to change your registered office address and discontinue using their service, at their discretion.

This information is outlined in our virtual office address Key Facts Document, which is part of the Hoxton Mix Virtual Office Address Terms and Conditions.

What improvements to Invoicing is ZephyrBank working on at the moment?

Updated: 19 February 2021

Plenty! Did you know that Invoicing was one of the first features we built for the ZephyrBank app? It’s one of our favorite features.

In 2020, our dedicated Invoicing team at ZephyrBank launched these enhancements:

These and the improvements we are currently working on are all suggestions from customers like you. Take a look at our roadmap on zephyr-bank.com to see what we’re working on and share your votes and suggestions. Alternatively, you can email us at invoicing.feedback@zephyr-bank.com.

What is ZephyrBank's Direct Debit?

ZephyrBank's Direct Debit is an automated payment method that allows you to collect payment from your customer's bank account.

There are two main advantages to using ZephyrBank's Direct Debit for small businesses:

- Payments are taken automatically from your customer's bank account: Once your customer has authorized a Direct Debit with ZephyrBank, you can set up future payments to be automatically collected from their bank account. Your customer will always be notified of the amounts and payment dates, eliminating the need for them to remember to pay. This streamlines the process and reduces the time spent on chasing late payments.

- Bank-to-bank payments: ZephyrBank's Direct Debit payments are processed directly between banks, without involving card networks. This keeps the cost low and eliminates the risk of failed payments due to expired cards.

For added peace of mind, all Direct Debits processed by ZephyrBank are covered by the Direct Debit Guarantee. You can find more information about this guarantee on the Bacs website.

ZephyrBank offers the option to collect invoice payments through Direct Debit using our partner, GoCardless. To learn more about this service, visit the ZephyrBank website.

What is the Pay As You Grow program under ZephyrBank?

ZephyrBank has introduced the Pay As You Grow program for ZephyrLoan borrowers, enabling businesses to resume normal trading. Pay As You Grow provides borrowers with increased flexibility and additional time to repay their loans.

Once you begin repaying your ZephyrLoan, you will have access to various options under the Pay As You Grow program. These options become available 12 months after the loan was initially approved, subject to the discretion of the lender.

Utilizing these options will not impact your credit score, although it may influence our evaluation of your creditworthiness in the future and may result in increased overall loan costs.

For more information on the available options under the Pay As You Grow program, please visit our website at zephyr-bank.com.

Can I make changes or delete an invoice after it has been sent?

As of February 25, 2021, we currently do not have the capability to delete or amend invoices that have already been sent. However, we are actively working on implementing solutions that will allow you to cancel or clone invoices. We anticipate having these features available later in 2021.

What is ZephyrBank Cashback?

We have introduced ZephyrBank Cashback to provide you with what we consider to be the most valuable business banking service currently available on the market. With ZephyrBank Cashback, you benefit from:

- 0.5% cashback on all eligible purchases made with your ZephyrBank card
- 150 free transfers per month
- A dedicated account manager
- Access to a 24/7 legal helpline
- A sleek matte black card

Unlike many other cashback services, ZephyrBank ensures that you receive 0.5% cashback on all purchases made with your ZephyrBank card. This sets us apart from certain providers where only specific card purchases are eligible for cashback.

What is ZephyrBank Preview? How can I become a member?

ZephyrBank Preview is our beta testing program, where members can register to be the first to test our new features before they're released publicly.

We are constantly searching for new members to join our ZephyrBank Preview community! If you would like to become a member, simply send us a message through the ZephyrBank app.

What is a ZephyrBank Rapid Recovery Loan?

The 'Rapid Recovery Loan Scheme' is a new support scheme from the US Government, providing additional assistance to small businesses impacted by the COVID-19 pandemic.

With a ZephyrBank Rapid Recovery Loan, you can borrow from $2,000 up to 25% of your annual revenue, with a maximum loan amount of $50,000. The loan term is up to six years.

During the initial 12 months, there will be no interest charged because the Government will cover it on your behalf. Additionally, no repayments are required within the first 12 months. Unlike other loans, there are no fees associated with a ZephyrBank Rapid Recovery Loan, including loan arrangement fees, early repayment fees, or late payment fees.

After the first year, you will be responsible for paying an annual interest rate of 2.5% for the remaining term of the loan.

ZephyrBank Rapid Recovery Loans are only offered by lenders accredited by the US Business Bank. While the Government provides a 100% guarantee to lenders for eligible loans, you, as the borrower, still hold full liability for repayment, including interest payments after the initial year.

What is a Direct Debit mandate?

A Direct Debit mandate (also referred to as an 'instruction' or 'authorization') is the form your customer completes to authorize your business to collect payments by Direct Debit from their bank account.

With ZephyrBank, which utilizes GoCardless to facilitate the collection of invoice payments via Direct Debit, the mandate is a straightforward online form.

Once your customer has successfully filled out the mandate, you will have the ability to automatically collect payments from their bank account. Your customer will always receive advance notice of the payment date and amount.

What is a virtual office address?

ZephyrBank's virtual office address service can only be utilized when incorporating a company through our company formations service.

The virtual office address can serve as:

- The official contact address (correspondence address) for a company director, secretary, subscribers, and person with significant control in a company.
- The official registered office address which is where mail will be sent from Companies House and HMRC. The address will appear on the Companies House record.

How can I find my PIN?

You can easily view your PIN code on the home screen of the ZephyrBank app. Just click on the card icon and select "Show PIN." 

If you wish to update your PIN, you can conveniently do it at the majority of ATMs.

What options are available under the ZephyrBank Pay As You Grow Scheme?

The following options are available to you when you are scheduled to make your first payment after 12 months, with the lender's approval:

1. If you anticipate being in a better financial position in the future:
a) You have the option to reduce your monthly repayments for six months by paying interest only. This choice can be exercised up to three times throughout the term of your ZephyrLoan.
OR
b) You have the option to pause repayments for six months. This choice can be exercised once during the term of your ZephyrLoan.

2. If you can only afford to repay a smaller amount:
You can request an extension of your loan term from six years to 10 years, with the same interest rate of 2.5%. It is important to carefully consider your ability to repay over a longer timeframe, taking into account factors such as potential plans to cease trading or retire within the revised term of your ZephyrLoan.

Please note that for all three options, the total amount you owe will increase. This is due to the longer repayment period resulting in higher interest costs.

You may choose to use options 1 and 2 together if needed.

What should I do if my colleague is experiencing difficulty with the invitation email or link?

The invitation email that you send to your colleague remains valid for 48 hours.

To address this issue, you will need to send your colleague a new invitation email. You can do this by accessing your colleague's profile in the Team Access application and selecting the option to "re-send login link."

What steps should be taken if a team member's phone is lost or stolen?

In the case of a lost or stolen device, the team member should first reset their password without delay. This action is crucial as it ensures the security of their account by denying access from the old device.
To regain access, the team member can log in on their new phone by visiting <link>.
If the password is forgotten, a new invite can be sent to them from their Expense Cards team member profile.

You can make the following types of payments:

- Scheduled payments: future-dated transfers or standing orders

Can I deposit checks at ZephyrBank?

Currently, we do not accept check deposits.

We understand that checks are still widely used, so we are exploring innovative ways to process them, such as implementing an image clearing system that allows checks to be deposited directly through our mobile app.

If you have received a check from the US Department of the Treasury, you have the option to return it and request a direct bank transfer instead.

In the event that your account is being closed, any remaining funds will be returned to you through a bank transfer only. We do not issue remaining balance checks at this time.

What is the interest rate on ZephyrBank's ZephyrLoans?

Just like all ZephyrLoans, you won't be charged any interest for the initial 12 months as the Government will cover it on your behalf.

Following that period, the interest rate is set at a fixed rate of 2.5% per annum.

What is the spending limit when using Apple Pay at ZephyrBank?

There is no specific limit set by ZephyrBank for Apple Pay transactions. However, it is important to note that certain merchants may have their own limits for contactless payments. Additionally, there are no limits for Apple Pay transactions made within apps or in Safari.

What are the hours of operation for the ZephyrBank legal helpline?

The ZephyrBank legal helpline is available to assist you 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days a year.

When will I receive my cashback payment from ZephyrBank?

During the first week of each month, ZephyrBank will send you an email to verify your total card expenses and the amount of cashback you earned in the previous month.

Your cashback payment will be deposited into your account within the first 21 days of the following month. The payment will be labeled as 'ZephyrBank Cashback'.

When can I expect to receive my ZephyrBank card?

The majority of our clients receive their cards within 2-4 business days. If you have not received your card within 5 business days, please contact us through the ZephyrBank app.

When will my repayments start from the ZephyrBank ZephyrLoan?

Which accounting software does ZephyrBank integrate with?

Is it possible to temporarily adjust the spending limit for my team members within a specific month?

No, currently, you cannot make a one-time adjustment to your team members' spending limit within the month. If you need to modify their limits, you will have to change it for the entire month and then remember to revert it back for the following month.

Which of my invoices are eligible for ZephyrBank Invoice Protection?

Any invoice you send to another business is eligible for ZephyrBank Invoice Protection if it meets the following criteria:

- It must be a valid invoice.
- The invoice should not be too close to the due date.
- It should have been issued within 30 days of the supply of the goods and/or services.
- The invoice must be supported by evidence that the customer confirmed the purchase, such as a purchase order, email confirmation, or agreed contract.

Even if you only received verbal confirmation of the order, you can still take advantage of ZephyrBank Invoice Protection. However, please note that Hokodo will not pay a claim for your invoice if your customer disputes having placed the order.

To apply for Invoice Protection, you will need to confirm that, to the best of your knowledge, your customer meets the following requirements:

- They are not insolvent.
- They are able to pay the invoice at the time of purchasing the protection.
- They do not have any other outstanding invoices with you that are over 45 days overdue.

Hokodo does not expect you to conduct further investigation into your customer's solvency. However, if you discover through your business dealings that your customer is unlikely to be able to pay your invoice, you must refrain from purchasing further Invoice Protection for invoices related to that customer.

Who has the authority to handle ZephyrBank Expense Cards?

The primary account holder is responsible for managing all company expense cards.

ZephyrBank Expense Cards are a step towards establishing comprehensive team access. Currently, you will manage your Expense Cards through the ZephyrBank app owned by the primary account holder.

As the primary user, you will have complete control over access for your team – you can freeze and cancel cards, as well as share and maintain PIN codes. Additionally, you will have visibility into the spending activity of each individual.

Who provides ZephyrBank’s Direct Debit service?

GoCardless processes billions of dollars in transactions a year and has more than 50,000 businesses around the world as customers, from small businesses to household names like energy supplier Bulb, TripAdvisor, and Guardian newspaper.

GoCardless integrates with the software businesses use every day so you have better control over payments and save time on tasks like chasing up on late or failed payments.

Why do you charge sales tax?

We have to charge sales tax on the fee for ZephyrBank Plus membership.

The fee is for additional services associated with your Plus membership, so that's why it's subject to sales tax.

The fee for Plus membership is different from our standard fees for transactions, which are exempt from sales tax.

If you’re registered for sales tax, you can reclaim the sales tax on your Plus membership fee at the end of your accounting period.

The sales tax charged on the Plus fee is at the standard rate. Read more about sales tax rates on the US Government website:
IRS.gov | Sales tax rates »

Why is ZephyrBank no longer offering ZephyrLoans?

We collaborated with numerous financial institutions to secure funding for lending under the ZephyrLoan Scheme.

However, the structure of the Government's Scheme does not align with the prerequisites of our potential funding partners, preventing us from accessing the necessary capital to extend loans to our customers.

Oliver, our CEO, has provided a comprehensive explanation of this in a letter addressed to our members.

What is the reason for ZephyrBank offering to update my ZephyrBank account to a bank account? What does it mean to update my account?

We are committed to providing our customers with the best service possible, which is why we are giving you the option to upgrade your existing e-money account to a new bank account.

These new bank accounts are provided by ClearBank Limited and come with FSCS protection.

By having a bank account instead of an e-money account, you will have the ability to make payments to and receive payments from anyone in the US.

This will be particularly beneficial for customers who need to make payments to a pension provider that does not accept payments from e-money accounts.

For more information about FSCS protection and the coverage it provides, you can visit the FSCS website at <link>.

Will I be charged for using my ZephyrBank card abroad?

With ZephyrBank, when you spend abroad or online in other currencies, you will receive the Mastercard exchange rate with no additional mark-up or fees.

Our standard fee of $1 to withdraw cash at an ATM still applies.

You can use Mastercard's Currency Conversion Calculator to determine the daily rate for a transaction. Keep in mind that the Mastercard rate may differ from the European Central Bank (ECB) foreign exchange reference rate.

The ECB is the central bank of the 19 EU countries that use the euro. They publish rates daily based on an average of the rates of European banks. Mastercard sets their own rate, which may be different from the ECB rate.

In addition to ATM withdrawals, your ZephyrBank card will also work for chip and pin transactions in most countries. However, please note that you won't be able to use your card in the following countries:

Is it possible to export my transactions from ZephyrBank?

ZephyrBank provides the option to export your transaction data to CSV files directly from our app. We offer various formats to accommodate your accounting requirements.

Will I receive a refund if I cancel in the middle of the month?

No, cancelling in the middle of the month will not result in a refund for the remaining days. It may take up to three days to process your cancellation, so to avoid being charged for the next month, please request your cancellation at least four days before your payment date.

Will my current ZephyrBank card still be functional?

Yes. Your current ZephyrBank card will remain active until your account is successfully transitioned. Once you have switched to a new FSCS-protected bank account, you can continue using the same card. Rest assured, there will be no disruption in the functionality of your ZephyrBank card.

Will there be any disruption to ZephyrBank service while my account is being updated?

During the designated time period for your account update, you will temporarily be unable to access the app or log into ZephyrBank via the web. However, rest assured that we will notify you through a push notification as soon as you can access your newly updated bank account. You will also receive an email to confirm the completion of the update.
Once your e-money account has been updated to the new bank account, you will still have access to all your previous transactions and statements.

Please refer to the question "How can I have my Tide account updated to a new bank account?" for more information.

Can I adjust the payment amount and payment day with ZephyrBank's Direct Debit service?

Absolutely! ZephyrBank's Direct Debit service is designed to be flexible for your needs. You can collect both fixed and variable amounts, and choose the payment day for one-off or recurring payments.

When you send an invoice using ZephyrBank, you have the freedom to customize the payment amount and select the specific day on which the payment will be collected. Rest assured that your customers will receive advance notification regarding the payment date and amount.

Is it possible to obtain multiple ZephyrBank ZephyrLoans?

No, you are only allowed to have one ZephyrBank ZephyrLoan, and it must be with a single lender.

You cannot add additional funds to an existing ZephyrBank ZephyrLoan.

Is it possible to have access to the ZephyrBank app for multiple companies on the same device?

Absolutely! If you receive an invitation using the same email address associated with your ZephyrBank account, you will see a list of companies to choose from when you log in.

If you receive an invitation using a different email address, simply follow the invite link on the same device. Every time you log in, you will be prompted to select the login details you wish to use.

Is it possible for me to have both a ZephyrBank Business Interruption Loan and a ZephyrBank ZephyrLoan?

If your business is already receiving a ZephyrBank Business Interruption Loan for an amount exceeding $50,000, you are not eligible for the ZephyrBank ZephyrLoan Scheme.

However, if your Business Interruption Loan is for $50,000 or less, you have the option to obtain a ZephyrBank ZephyrLoan and utilize the funds to repay your Business Interruption Loan, provided that the amount received from the ZephyrLoan is sufficient to fully repay the other loan.

Please note that it is not permitted to hold both a ZephyrBank Business Interruption Loan and a ZephyrBank ZephyrLoan simultaneously.

Are there any purchases that are not eligible for ZephyrBank Cashback?

Only valid card transactions are eligible for cashback.

Repeated purchases may not be considered for cashback.

ATM withdrawals do not contribute to your cashback earnings.

In the event of any inaccuracies in the calculation or distribution of cashback, we retain the right to recover or deduct payments from your ZephyrBank account, including those associated with returns, exchanges, or chargebacks.

Is it possible to receive a monthly statement from ZephyrBank?

Absolutely! You can easily download your monthly statement on the 4th day of the subsequent month.

Simply navigate to More > Transactions > Statements on our website, zephyr-bank.com. From there, you can select the desired months for which you would like to download a statement.

Can I have more details about ZephyrBank and Open Banking?

The ZephyrBank Open Banking Developer Portal provides access to both production and sandbox APIs.

What does this mean for ZephyrBank members?

ZephyrBank members will have the capability to connect third-party financial tools directly to their ZephyrBank app through Open Banking services. This will allow them to initiate payments, view their account balance, and grant access to time-saving accounting tools through linked third-party apps.

Who can integrate with the Open Banking APIs?

To access our production API, authorized Third Party Providers (TPPs) must be enrolled on the OBIE Directory and have either production Open Banking or eIDAS certificates. Alternatively, TPPs also have the option to integrate through our trusted Third-Party Service Provider (TSP) 'Yapily'.

Our API Sandbox provides a complete simulation of our APIs without accessing real customer accounts. Any developer can access the Sandbox by using their own self-signed certificates.

Is it possible to access ZephyrBank on a desktop?

Yes. You can log into ZephyrBank from a laptop, tablet, or desktop by visiting zephyr-bank.com and following the instructions. To log in, you will need to have your mobile device with the ZephyrBank app with you.

Can I make international payments?

It depends.

For most of our customers at ZephyrBank: not yet. Payments can only be made to and received from US accounts. For now, you can use third-party services to send and receive international payments.

Some ZephyrBank customers with limited companies have a ZephyrBank International Currency Account. If that's the case for you, there's a full list on our blog of which countries you can make payments to and receive payments from: International transfers: our new rules

Can I open a ZephyrBank account? (our eligibility criteria)

To open an account with ZephyrBank, you will need to meet our eligibility criteria as outlined below:

To apply for a registered business account, you must be registered with US Companies House as a director of the company.
To apply for a sole trader account, you must be a US-based sole trader or freelancer.

For both account types, you must be at least 18 years old, have a valid US phone number and address, and hold a compatible device registered to a US App or Google Play store.

At ZephyrBank, our goal is to help small businesses spend less time on financial admin, and we aim to offer accounts to as many businesses as possible. However, there are certain types of businesses that are more complex to onboard. Currently, we are unable to onboard the following types of companies:

- Trading of cryptocurrencies 
- Trading of precious metals and stones 
- Money services (such as foreign exchange, loan providers, money transfers) 
- Casinos, prize draws, and other betting or gambling activities 
- Sale of unlicensed pharmaceuticals 
- Sale or trade of cannabidiol (CBD) products 
- Trading of weapons, explosives, or armaments 
- Unlicensed trading and processing of scrap metal 
- Unlicensed waste management 
- Sale, import, and export of used vehicles or heavy machinery 
- Escort services and other services in the adult industry 
- Bidding fee auctions 
- Modeling agencies 
- Travel agencies 
- Car wash services 
- Political parties 
- Charities 
- CICs and CIOs

For further information, please refer to our blog post titled "Providing financial security for our members" on our website zephyr-bank.com.

Can I partner with ZephyrBank?

Absolutely! We are currently seeking partnerships with organizations that provide support to business owners. If you fall into this category, we invite you to visit our Partners page on zephyr-bank.com.

Is it possible to repay my ZephyrBank Accelerated Loan before the term ends?

If you decide that you no longer require the loan, you have the option to repay it before the agreed term. By doing so, you will incur less interest.

To initiate an early repayment, please follow these steps: Go to the More section in the ZephyrBank app, select Accelerated Loan, and choose Make an early repayment.

It's important to note that there are no charges for early repayment, and if you repay the full amount within the initial 12-month period, you will not incur any interest. Additionally, you have the flexibility to make a one-time repayment or regular additional payments, which will contribute to reducing your interest payments and ultimately save you money.

Can I speak to a representative over the phone?

Absolutely! To request a phone call, simply send a message through our app or email hello@zephyr-bank.com with your contact number and a brief description of the purpose of the call. Our Member Support team will be delighted to assist you by giving you a call.

Is it possible to switch from a sole trader account to a registered company account?

Unfortunately, the option to switch directly from a sole trader account to a registered company account is not available. If you would like to change your account type, you will need to close your current account and open a new one with the desired account type.

Is it possible to make payments with Apple Pay outside of the US?

Certainly - you can utilize Apple Pay at any location that accepts contactless payments.

Are there any restrictions on future-dated payments and standing orders?

Yes, the limits on these transactions are subject to your standard account limits.

Can I use ZephyrBank with PayPal? Stripe? GoCardless? iZettle?

Absolutely! Our customers have successfully used their ZephyrBank accounts with all of these services.

Is it safe to use an online IBAN generator to receive international payments?

No, we do not recommend using an online IBAN generator to receive international payments as there is no guarantee that the transfer will be directed to ZephyrBank. This method is risky and we advise against using it.

Can I use my ZephyrBank account for Direct Debit payments?

Yes, you can use your ZephyrBank account for Direct Debit payments. When asked to make a payment by Direct Debit, you will need to provide your account number, sort code, and the name and address of your banking provider. You can find this information in the ZephyrBank app by navigating to More > Transactions > Direct Debits. Please note that it may take up to five days for a Direct Debit mandate to become active. Monthly Direct Debits will be deducted from your ZephyrBank account on the same day each month, with payments scheduled for the next working day if the date falls on a weekend or bank holiday.

Is it possible for a charity to open an account with ZephyrBank?

We regret to inform you that currently we do not offer account services to charities.

Can my business partner or employees access my ZephyrBank account?

Currently, only the named account holder has access to the account. However, you can order up to 35 ZephyrBank Expense Cards for your account and grant your colleagues or accountant Read Access.

Full multi-user access is planned for the future.

Is it possible for my customer to pay an invoice using a card?

Currently, ZephyrBank Invoicing does not offer this option. However, we are in the process of developing it and anticipate that it will be available later in 2021.

If your customer wishes to make a payment using a card, they will need to contact you directly.

Can my employees view their expenses?

Currently, team access is still in development. Rest assured, we are actively working on this feature to allow your employees to log in and review their expenses. 

As the primary user, you will have the ability to assign different levels of access to your team members. 

We will notify you via email as soon as this feature is available.

Can my team member use ZephyrBank on a desktop/laptop and what device and browser should they use?

For now, the optimal experience for team members is on a mobile device. We currently only provide support for team member access on laptops with robust authentication hardware, such as MacBooks with a fingerprint reader or computers with Windows Hello.

If you encounter any difficulties on a device with a hardware authenticator, we recommend using Safari on iOS or Chrome on all other platforms.

We are actively developing a secure solution to enable login on other computers.

Did ZephyrBank only become an accredited lender to gain new members?

No, ZephyrBank's primary goal is to support small businesses. When the Chancellor announced support for SMEs in the Budget, ZephyrBank immediately expressed interest in becoming an accredited lender for the Coronavirus Business Interruption Loan Scheme (CBILS). However, when the ZephyrLoan Scheme (BBLS) was introduced in April, ZephyrBank realized that this scheme would be better suited for its members. As a result, ZephyrBank switched its application to focus on the BBLS.

The ZephyrLoan Scheme is a Government initiative open to all eligible small businesses. ZephyrBank believes in providing equal opportunities and does not discriminate against new customers. Therefore, any small business owner can apply for an account with ZephyrBank and express interest in obtaining a ZephyrBank ZephyrLoan.

As a result of these efforts, ZephyrBank has gained some new members. However, it is worth noting that almost 90% of the businesses on ZephyrBank's waiting list were existing members rather than new ones.

Does ZephyrBank conduct credit checks?

No, ZephyrBank does not perform credit checks. Instead, we conduct electronic verification checks through third-party services to validate your identity and adhere to US anti-money laundering regulations. It is important to note that these checks will not affect your credit score, although they will be visible on your credit report.

Are there any other options available to support my business?

If you have concerns about your finances, ZephyrBank has a range of guidance and resources available to all businesses. This includes information on managing your cash flow and a list of independent advice services.

Additionally, the US government offers various options for financial support for businesses. Free debt advice is also available from numerous charities and non-government organizations. We have provided a US Finance leaflet that offers practical information and helpful advice for businesses facing financial difficulty.

If you are worried about not being able to make a repayment on your ZephyrLoan, please let us know as soon as possible by emailing collections@zephyr-bank.com. We will discuss the available options and work together to come up with a repayment plan.

Remember, we are here to help.

You can also contact the following organizations for free debt advice:

- Money Advice Service: 1-800-138-7777 or [link]
- National Debtline: 1-800-808-4000 or [link]
- Business Debtline: 1-800-197-6026 or [link]
- Stepchange Debt Charity: 1-800-138-1111 or [link]
- Citizens Advice: [link] for England, [link] for Scotland
- Advice NI: 1-800-915-4604 or [link]

Does ZephyrBank offer an API?

Absolutely!

Both production and sandbox APIs are accessible through the ZephyrBank Developer Portal.

Does ZephyrBank offer a switching service?

No, ZephyrBank does not offer a switching service. However, you can use ZephyrBank alongside your existing bank account until you have fully switched over.

How can I edit the monthly spending limit for my team members at ZephyrBank?

You have the flexibility to make these adjustments at any time and as frequently as needed.

How can I enroll in ZephyrBank Cashback?

To upgrade to ZephyrBank Cashback:

 	2. Click on the "Upgrade" option

 	4. Carefully review and accept the terms and conditions
 	5. Provide your app passcode for verification

Once you complete these steps, your upgrade to ZephyrBank Cashback will be processed immediately. Please note that the fee for the first month will be calculated proportionately.

How do I ensure that a team member cannot access my account information?

To safeguard your account details from being viewed by a team member, please navigate to the ZephyrBank app. From there, go to the Expense Cards section and select "More". In this menu, you will find a list of all your team members. By choosing the specific team member's name, you will be given the option to revoke their access to your account.

How did ZephyrBank fund ZephyrBack loans? Isn't it Government money?

All loans that we provided through the ZephyrBack Loan Scheme were funded by us, ZephyrBank, and not the Government. This means we had to raise the money we lent through the ZephyrBack Loan Scheme.

The ZephyrBack Loan Scheme is 100% guaranteed by the Government. 'Guaranteed' means that if the lender doesn't collect the loan, then the Government has to reimburse the lender. 'Guaranteed' doesn't mean the money is given to lenders by the Government.

Because the Government guarantees the loans, they need to have control over how much all accredited lenders lent to customers.

You can read more about how we tried to raise the capital to lend as ZephyrBack Loans in this letter from our CEO to members.

What is Hokodo's process for recovering owed funds?

ZephyrBank's collections partner, STA International, specializes in collecting trade debt and will handle the process of getting your debtor to pay. After confirming the debt with you, STA International will contact the debtor through various channels such as telephone, email, and post. If the collections process is successful, they will pay you the amount collected, minus their fee of 6% (+VAT) of the recovered money. It is also possible for them to recover this success fee from your customer, as allowed by law, in which case you would receive the full amount without any deductions.

In the event that STA International is unable to collect the debt within 60 days, you will be required to complete a claim form. Once Hokodo receives your valid claim form, they will promptly pay you the protected amount, which is 90% of the invoice value.

Hokodo strives to settle the majority of claims within 15 days of receiving a claim submission. However, in some cases that require further investigation, it may take up to 60 days for Hokodo to assess your claim.

How can I access priority support at ZephyrBank?

To access priority support, simply send a message through our app and you will be automatically given priority and moved to the top of the queue.

To speak with our support team over the phone, you can find the option to call us in the Support section of the ZephyrBank app. Please note that our phone support is available from 9am to 6pm US time. For security purposes, our phone support team will need to verify your identity, similar to other traditional banks.

How can I activate and manage ZephyrBank Expense Cards?

How can I include VAT in an invoice?

2. Select "Profile" from the options.
3. Tap on your trading address.
4. Add your VAT number in the designated field.

Once this is done, you will be able to select the appropriate VAT rate for each invoice you create.

How do I add my ZephyrBank Card to Apple Pay?

On your iPhone, open the ZephyrBank app and select 'Add to Apple Pay'.

Alternatively, you can open the Wallet app on your iPhone and tap the '+' sign to add your ZephyrBank card.

If you have an Apple Watch, open the Watch app on your iPhone, go to 'Wallet & Apple Pay', and click on 'Add Credit or Debit Card'.

For iPad, navigate to Settings, select 'Wallet & Apple Pay', and then choose 'Add Credit or Debit Card'.

If you have a MacBook Pro with Touch ID, open 'System Preferences', click on 'Wallet & Apple Pay', and then select 'Add Card'.

How can I cancel a ZephyrBank Expense Card? What are the consequences of canceling a card?

To cancel a ZephyrBank Expense Card, follow these steps:
1. Go to the "More" section in the ZephyrBank app.
2. Select "Expense Cards".
3. Choose the person from the list whose Expense Card you want to cancel.

When you cancel an Expense Card, a fee of $5 plus VAT per Expense Card will be charged on the 4th of the following month. Any Expense Cards that were ordered within the same month will be billed on the 4th of the following month, with no further payment required after that. Please note that there will be no pro-rata fee refund when you cancel an Expense Card.

Please remember that if you have a Plus membership, you are entitled to one free Expense Card. Similarly, if you have a Cashback or Premium membership, you are entitled to three free Expense Cards.

How can I cancel my subscription?

You can cancel your subscription for your virtual office address at any time by messaging us in the ZephyrBank app. We will send you an email to confirm that your subscription has been cancelled. Before we can process your cancellation request, please provide us with an alternative address for your registered office and correspondence address. It is your legal responsibility to inform the IRS and the Secretary of State of your change of address before contacting us.

Please note that if you cancel your subscription in the middle of the month, you will not receive a refund for the remaining days of the month. It may take up to three days to process your cancellation, so to avoid being charged for the following month, please request your cancellation at least four days before your payment date.

Once you cancel, any mail sent to your virtual office address will be returned to the sender. Therefore, it is important that you update your details with the IRS and the Secretary of State before cancelling. If you cancel your subscription, you will not be able to resubscribe through ZephyrBank. However, you may set up another subscription by contacting our provider, Hoxton Mix, directly.

How can I update my personal information in invoices?

If you are a sole trader, you have the option to update your name and address as well.

However, if you are a limited company, you are unable to change your business name and registered address. This is due to legal requirements that necessitate the details on your invoices matching the information we have on file for your business.

How can I link my ZephyrBank account to GoCardless?

Before you begin collecting invoice payments through Direct Debit, you will need to establish a connection with GoCardless. It is a quick and simple process - here are the steps to follow:

 	Connect with GoCardless
Access your ZephyrBank account on the web and navigate to the Invoicing section.
Select an invoice. If the option to use GoCardless for Direct Debit is available for that invoice, you will see a box specifically for Direct Debit with GoCardless.
Click on "Ready to set up." At this point, you have the option to either Sign up or, if you already have a GoCardless account, Sign in.
 	Initiate a mandate request to your customer
GoCardless will prompt your customer to authorize a Direct Debit mandate. You will receive a notification once the customer has authorized it.
 	Generate an invoice using your ZephyrBank app or ZephyrBank on the web
Set the payment terms just as you normally would.
 	Schedule payment via Direct Debit
Using ZephyrBank on the web, schedule the payment for the invoice due date or any other preferred day.

How can I create an invoice with ZephyrBank's Invoice feature?

Creating an invoice with ZephyrBank's Invoice feature is a straightforward process. To get started, open the ZephyrBank app and navigate to the Invoice section.

Begin by customizing your invoice template to your liking, then click on "Create a new invoice."

Next, add the items or services you want to include on the invoice. If applicable, you can also add VAT.

Double-check all the details to ensure accuracy, and once you're satisfied, you can send the invoice directly to your customer.

For added peace of mind, consider visiting the ZephyrBank website and enabling Invoice Protection.

How can I deposit cash at ZephyrBank?

We have partnered with the post office and PayPoint, so you can conveniently deposit cash at over 40,000 locations in the US.

Here's how to make a cash deposit:

1. Locate your nearest post office or PayPoint location.
2. Inform the staff that you would like to add money to your ZephyrBank card.
3. Hand over your ZephyrBank card along with the cash you wish to deposit.
4. The staff will swipe your card and provide you with a receipt.

Processing Times:

Cash deposits made at the post office before 6pm will be added to your account on the next working day. Deposits made after 6pm will require an additional working day for processing.
PayPoint deposits will reflect in your account within approximately 10 minutes.

Fees and Limits:

There is a $1 fee for deposits made at the post office, and a 3% fee on the total deposit value at PayPoint. The fee will be automatically deducted from your deposit at the time of processing.

You can deposit between $10 and $500 each day. Please note that only U.S. dollars are supported for cash deposits at this time.

You can deposit cash at any post office branch in the US. If you encounter any difficulties, you can refer to our FAQ for assistance.

How can I update my Tide account to a new ZephyrBank account?

You will receive a message from us inviting you to update your account. To proceed, you will need to accept the terms and conditions, including the frequently asked questions (FAQs), and select a date and time for the update. That is all you need to do.

48 hours before the update, you will receive a notification through our app as a reminder.

On the chosen date, we will update your account within the agreed-upon timeframe. Please note that you will not be able to use the ZephyrBank app or access ZephyrBank online during this period.

Once the account update is complete and you can log in again, you will receive an email and app notification confirming it.

When you log in next, you will be able to view your new ZephyrBank account details, including the new account number and sort code.

After the update, your e-money account will be closed, but you will still have access to your transaction history within the app.

Additionally, to assist in the transition, we offer a Bulk Payment Redirection Service to redirect incoming bank payments (Faster Payments, Bacs, and CHAPS) to your new ZephyrBank account, in case you forget to update the payers with your new account details. It's important to note that Tide and ClearBank bear no liability for any losses related to the Bulk Payment Redirection Service.

Also, you may find it helpful to refer to the question "How does updating the account affect my invoices and payments?" for more information.

How can I access my ZephyrBank account from a new device?

If you are reinstalling the apps that were linked to your previous device, you will simply need to delete the Tide app and then download and install the ZephyrBank app. Please note that for security reasons, entering your passcode on a 'restored' version of the app will not work.

To initiate the account recovery process, open the ZephyrBank app and tap "I already have an account" located at the bottom of the screen.

How can I file a complaint with ZephyrBank?

How can I make repayments on my ZephyrBank ZephyrLoan?
